oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Jesse Lee Jones and Brazilbilly - 2008-05-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jesse Lee Jones and Brazilbilly along with Ronny Robbins. Held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 10, 2008. Also includes interview segment with Jesse Lee Jones, Ronny Robbins, Jack Pruett. Held as a companion to a Marty Robbins exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jesse Lee Jones; Ronny Robbins;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hosted by Mick Buck. Brazilbilly performances include "Singing The Blues" -- "I'll Go On Alone" -- "A White Sport Coat (And A Pink Carnation)" -- "Ruby Ann" -- "I Walk Alone" -- "Devil Woman" -- "El Paso City" -- Ronny Robbins sings medley of Marty Robbins songs including Tonight Carmen/Ribbon Of Darkness/Big Iron/Twentieth Century Drifter/Tonight Carmen (Ronny Robbins) -- " Begging to You/Don't Worry/Love Me" (Ronny Robbins) -- interview with Jesse Lee Jones, Ronny Robbins, Jack Pruett -- "Ballad Of A Small Man" (Ronny Robbins) -- "Cool Water" (Jesse Lee Jones and Ronny Robbins) -- "My Love" (Ronny Robbins) -- "Mr. Shorty" (Jesse Lee Jones) -- "My Woman, My Woman, My Wife" (Ronny Robbins) -- "Some Memories Just Won't Die" (Ronny Robbins) -- "Among My Souvenirs" (Jesse Lee Jones) -- "El Paso" (Jesse Lee Jones)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Robbins, Marty; Robbins, Ronnie; Jones, Jesse Lee; Pruett, Jack; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
